fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Footprints: The first time you trade, learn if the other player truly wins with the King at the end of the phase. 
- Files: Learn 3 roles. At least 2 of them (75% chance) or 3 of them (25% chance) will be in the game. [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Detect: Pick 3 non-King players that arenâ€™t yourself. Learn if the majority of them win with the King or not at the end of the phase. [3 uses, 3 CD, Astral, Unlocks D2] 
- Trace: Pick a card. Learn 4 names, 1 of which played that card. [2 uses, 2 CD]
- Documents: Gain a non-special item card of your choice. Gain a use for every 3 players you outlive. [1 use, 2 CD, Recharging, 0/3]
